entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Lac-Saint-Jean
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:05 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Roberval Airport 1:51 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -13.3°C
Wind: S 30 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 7.
